DOC.brief_summary: The present study determine effect Xylose consumption postprandial hyperglycemia normal ( n=25 ) hyperglycemic subject ( n=50 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Beneficial Effect Xylose Consumption Postprandial Hyperglycemia
DOC.detailed_description: In double-blind crossover design study , Participants randomly assign consume sucrose drink ( Control , sucrose 50g + deionize water 100g ) sucrose drink additionally contain 5 g ( Test 1 , sucrose : xylose = 10:1 ) , 3.33 g ( Test 2 , sucrose : xylose = 15:1 ) 2.5 g ( Test 3 , sucrose : xylose = 20:1 ) D-xylose week interval .
DOC.criteria: 1 ) healthy subject Impaired fasting glucose ( fast serum glucose 100 125 mg/dL ) 1. history take insulininjection oral hypoglycemic agent 2. evidence alcohol abuse alcoholism 3. pregnancy breast feed 4. chronic gastrointestinal disorder 5. seriously abnormal liver renal function 6. occupation risk death hypoglycemia occurs
